content.title: Swaying Palm Tree Yoga Pose Instructions

items: Stand with your feet hip-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Shift your weight onto your left foot and lift your right foot off the ground.
Bend your right knee and place the sole of your right foot on your left thigh, pressing your foot into your thigh.
Bring your hands together in front of your chest in a prayer position.
Slowly raise your arms above your head, keeping your palms together.
Lengthen your spine and reach up through your fingertips, feeling a stretch in your side body.
Hold the pose for several breaths, then release and repeat on the other side.
